actions.text: Amendment SA 871 not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 26 - 74. Record Vote Number: 49.
Amendment SA 871 proposed by Senator Cruz. (consideration: CR S457-458; text: CR S457) To establish a deficit-neutral reserve fund relating to conventional biofuel credit cap during a pandemic.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 871 proposed by Senator Cruz.
Roll call votes on amendments in Senate: Amendment SA 871 not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 26 - 74. Record Vote Number: 49.

purpose: To establish a deficit-neutral reserve fund relating to conventional biofuel credit cap during a pandemic.
